phone.description: Plain phone number that only includes '+' sign. Example: `+13088726022`

birthDate.description: Cannot be in the future or more than 130 years ago

transfer processed through the Federal Reserve Banks FedwireService.

pageCount.description: Total count of pages for this data

resourceCount.description: Total count of items in this data

inputSource.description: InputSource - 8 Alpha or Alpha-Numeric characters identifying the source

inputSequenceNumber.description: InputSequenceNumber - a 6 digit number assigned for uniqueness

PersonalDocumentType.description: The document type based on the size-profile of the ID according to ISO/IEC 7810.

documentIds.description: Document ids should contain unique values and at least one element

routingNumber.description: Valid 9-digit ABA routing transit number associated with the account.

amount.description: `amount` and `receiverAmount` at the same time are not supported

receiverAmount.description: `amount` and `receiverAmount` at the same time are not supported

amount.description: Value to deposit. Required if `receiverAmount` is not provided. Only `amount` or `receiverAmount` should be provided at the same time.

receiverAmount.description: Value to receive. Required if `amount` is not provided. Only `amount` or `receiverAmount` should be provided at the same time.

beneficiaryCompanyRegistrationDate.description: A date in the YYYY-MM-DD format.

accounts.description: Tenant accounts from different banking partners.

documentIds.description: Ids of attached documents for Settlement ChinaConnect

confirmationDocumentUrl.description: URL of attached proof of payment document for Settlement GlobalConnect

gasFeeUsd.description: Gas fee for the crypto transaction, converted to USD

enabled.description: Whether this webhook config is enabled.

tenantId.description: Gets or sets the client identifier.

enabled.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this Keyrails.BankingApi.Application.Models.Webhooks.WebhookConfigResponseModel is enabled.

sharedSecret.description: Gets or sets the shared secret.

createdAtUtc.description: Gets or sets the created at UTC.

updatedAtUtc.description: Gets or sets the updated at UTC.
